items.name: tooltip-button
items.title: Tooltip Button
items.description: A button component with a tooltip that appears on hover, combining the functionality of a button with additional explanatory text that helps users understand its purpose. Useful for providing context without cluttering the interface.

items.name: select
items.title: Select
items.description: A select component that allows users to choose an option from a list of options. Useful for providing a list of options to the user.

items.name: icon-boolean
items.title: Icon Boolean
items.description: A boolean icon component that displays a check or cross icon based on a boolean value. Supports different sizes, variants, and fallback states for null/undefined values.

items.name: navbar
items.title: Navbar
items.description: A responsive navigation bar component with customizable icon and content sections. Useful for providing a navigation bar to the user.

items.name: sidebar
items.title: Sidebar
items.description: A collapsible side navigation panel for organizing content and navigation links. Useful for providing a sidebar to the user.

items.name: combobox
items.title: Combobox
items.description: A searchable dropdown component that allows selecting from a list of items with keyboard navigation and filtering capabilities. Useful for providing a combobox to the user.

items.name: debounce
items.title: Debounce
items.description: A React hook that delays updating a value until a specified delay time has passed since the last change. This is useful for preventing excessive updates when a value changes rapidly, such as handling search input or window resize events. The hook returns the debounced value which only updates after the user stops changing the input for the delay period.
